mulan.regressor.transformation

Class TransformationBasedMultiTargetRegressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearnerBase
      • mulan.regressor.transformation.TransformationBasedMultiTargetRegressor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, MultiLabelLearner, TechnicalInformationHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnsembleOfRegressorChains, MultiTargetStacking, RandomLinearCombinations, RegressorChain, RegressorChainSimple, SingleTargetRegressor

    public abstract class TransformationBasedMultiTargetRegressor
extends MultiLabelLearnerBase
    Base class for multi-target regressors that use a single-target transformation to handle multi-target data.

    For more information, see:
    E. Spyromitros-Xioufis, G. Tsoumakas, W. Groves, I. Vlahavas. 2014. Multi-label Classification Methods for Multi-target Regression. arXiv e-prints.
    Version:
    2014.04.01
    Author:
    Eleftherios Spyromitros-Xioufis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getModel

        public String getModel()
        Returns a string representation of the multi-target regression model by calling getModelForTarget(int) for each target. Should always by called after the model has been initialized.
        Returns:
        a string representation of the multi-target regression model

      • getModelForTarget

        protected abstract String getModelForTarget(int targetIndex)
        Returns a string representation of the single-target regression model build for the target with this targetIndex.
        Parameters:
        targetIndex - the target's index
        Returns:
        a string representation of the single-target regression model
